name: Charlotte Katakuri
text: Activate: Main You may trash this character: If your leader has the (Big Mom Pirates) type, play up to one [Charlotte Katakuri] from your hand that has a cost of 3 or greater and a cost less than or equal to the number of Don!! your opponent has.
